titleStmt.title: An humble remonstrance in the behalfe of the Protestants of this kingdome, for setling the present distractions in religion, by a nationall synod With the names of the divines appointed and approved of by the Parliament to be consulted with in the nationall synod, for setling of religion, and reformation of church-government.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
